vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.8.4
§ Anaiah = "Jehovah has answered"
a priest who helped Ezra and signed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; post exílico; (b)   jefe; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞奈雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已回應"
一位協助以斯拉的祭司, 他並在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽了名
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚奈雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已回应"
一位协助以斯拉的祭司, 他并在和尼希米所订的公约上签了名

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.22
§ Anaiah = "Jehovah has answered"
a priest who helped Ezra and signed the covenant with Nehemiah
